before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"8i3ar","text":"Read background information, MIOP and BePOP-OBON information under the \"Guidelines\" tab.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5nr7g","text":"This protocol describes the preparation of sucrose lysis buffer to preserve DNA on sterivex filters. The protocol is part of the Hakai Institute's pipeline to analyze microbial and environmental DNA from seawater samples and is implemented as a standard procedure for ongoing sampling programs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"au6pi","text":"Top up water to 500 mL. (no need to pH this one!)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"etm8r","text":"Add a stir bar and dissolve all powder.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3euvf","text":"Add milliQ water to about the 400 mL line.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bbbtp","text":"Add   of   Tris to the beaker.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fiu6u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5imgg","text":"Calculation of Tris or EDTA:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ajio5","text":"Use the equation C1V1 = C2V2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f65qg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8npg3","text":"Eg for EDTA:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d9i8n","text":"(0.5M)(X mL) = (0.04M)(500 mL)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":30}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5hu2c","text":"Solve for X","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"15vqd","text":"((0.04M)(500 mL)/(0.5M)) = 40 mL of 0.5M EDTA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":45}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"25","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"1","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":21}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7kegl","text":"Weigh out and add appropriate amount of Sucrose calculated in step 1 and place in a bottle or beaker.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
